messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Hidden DOCK - Boat VANISHES? LOG 22-5876/009 | Seas: Tidal – Whirl.3)Damp Journals7)Torn Maps (E of 7)4)Captain’s Old HatH.O.R.I.Z.O.N.Missing Star?Dusk DiveA.B.Y.S.S.Broken Compass (Reported) SHADOWY Figures at Shore?CHIEF OFFICER: M. ThompsonW.A.V.E. 6.47P09 0523Gallagher, LILIANEDOCK:ANCHORAGE:CONTACT: 41-2087DETECTIVE: P. MaloneFILE: 23-3201- 94HAPPENING: 09:50NAVIGATION STATUS (MARK)65432 - INCONCLUSIVE...Ian Dunbar DATE 7/20/24Confidential: Hold Tight.  Twilight, 6:40PM, 19. July 2024 - Officer K. Denton and Sergeant Lana Hale, during a routine patrol, observed a peculiar sight at Dock 45, Harborfront. The water, normally calm, churned as if a storm approached. At the center, a boat named Ecliptic Dream, shimmering oddly. 7:55PM, Tech Julia from Harborfront's Recon Unit reported the boat's mysterious absence.  FORWARD IMMEDIATELY HARBOR ARCHIVES.4- UNIT [ ]Sgt. K. Denton Surveillance Binoculars.Tidal Chart (E of 3 & reference)Old Diary : 1889).Ripples in Time (Audio Logs)Surge 2: DepthsDEEP-SEA FILES49-8712-84.. /L 790301-13OBSERVED LIAM BARNES6-19-24 4:33 P.M.Abyssal LegendsTech. HardyStevens, Grace.Mysteries: Tides Whisper.  On the misty morning of 21 July 2024, 5:02AM, Sergeant Lana Hale, clutching a salt-stained diary, divulged secrets of Dock 45's past. Liam Barnes, a marine archaeologist, spoke of the Ecliptic Dream once before in 1978, suggesting a link to ancient mariners and otherworldly expeditions.  Grace Stevens, last seen near the dock, whispered tales of sailors returning as ghosts, their stories lost to the sea. Hale's notes from 23 July 24 hinted at the boat’s ethereal nature, Every wave holds a tale. But in these waters, tales drown only to resurface.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Officer K. Denton  Officer Context:On 19 July 2024, Officer K. Denton and Sergeant Lana Hale observed a peculiar sight at Dock 45, Harborfront. Officer Role:Officer Officer Name: Sergeant Lana Hale  Officer Context: On 19 July 2024, Sergeant Lana Hale, accompanied by Officer K. Denton, noticed an unusual activity at Dock 45, Harborfront. On the morning of 21 July 2024, Sergeant Lana Hale shared information about Dock 45's history. Officer Role:Sergeant Officer Name: Tech Julia  Officer Context:At 7:55PM on 19 July 2024, Tech Julia from Harborfront's Recon Unit reported on the mysterious disappearance of the boat named Ecliptic Dream. Officer Role:Technician Officer Name: Tech. Hardy  Officer Context:Mentioned in relation to Abyssal Legends. Officer Role:Technician
